description: RIA-7986 List case without hearing requirements automatically (Failed request)

confirmation.body:
![Hearing could not be listed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hmcts/ia-appeal-frontend/master/app/assets/images/hearingCouldNotBeListed.png)

#### What happens next

The hearing could not be auto-requested. Please manually request the hearing via the [Hearings tab](/cases/case-details/7986/hearings)
